pr_title: Linkage Checker to use exclusion XML file for default special cases

timeline.bodyText: linkage-checker-exclusion-default.xml is a file in a JAR file when running as enforcer rule. So picking up URL rather than Path.
timeline.author: suztomo

timeline.bodyText: This method is non-static because exclusionMatchers field is an instance variable.
timeline.author: suztomo

timeline.bodyText: These Java logic is replaced with the XML file linkage-checker-exclusion-default.xml below.
timeline.author: suztomo

timeline.bodyText: List feels wrong here, as if it's exposing implementation details. Would it make sense to have a single object that contains a list, rather than a bunch of matchers? See comment below.
timeline.author: elharo

timeline.bodyText:
This list iteration logic could become part of an ExcludedErrors class. Then it becomes simply
return excludedErrors.contains(symbolProblem, sourceClass)
timeline.author: elharo

timeline.message: Using Reason element in default rule
